div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1060 Olbia (mod. Parutino), 1959 Burial: late 4th cent. B.C. Contents: 97 AE. In one room Olbia: 1 aes grave (as Burachkov, pl. 1, 6 or 8) 83 AE (as AMNG I.1, pl. 9, 4 [2], 5 [3], 7 [1], 8 [7], 10 [6], 11 [5], 12 [2], 13 [3], 16 [5], 17 [4], 20 [5], 22 [12], 23 [23], 26-27 [1]; pl. 10, 1 [4]) Unc.: 13 AE Disposition: Leningrad (Institute) Information from P. O. Karyszkowski
